title: Collab Memory Consolidation Pipeline
reason: We need this skill because multi-agent systems underperform without explicit conflict resolution. This specific skill turns raw logs into durable reusable memory.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Collab Memory Consolidation Pipeline`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to deadlocks and degraded trust.
Design and version the input/output contract for proposals, contention signals, and negotiated outcomes, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using episodic-to-semantic consolidation, and produce consolidated memory snapshots with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover deadlocks and degraded trust, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.

validationGates.check: All required input signals present and schema-valid
Repeated run on same inputs yields stable scoring and artifacts
Approval gates satisfied before publish-level outputs

knownFailures.action: Reject payload, emit validation error, request corrected payload
Freeze output, escalate to human approval router
Apply retry policy then rollback to last stable baseline

produces: Collab Memory Consolidation Pipeline normalized artifacts
